CTeleporter.cpp

00001 #include "CTeleporter.h"
00002 #include "../../../sdl/sound/CSound.h"
00003 
00004 // Teleporter on world map
00005 // (animates the teleporter and moves the player)
00006 // (ep1&3)
00007 
00008 #define TELEPORT_GRAY_BASEFRAME_EP1  342
00009 #define TELEPORT_GRAY_IDLEFRAME_EP1  99
00010 
00011 #define TELEPORT_RED_BASEFRAME_EP1   338
00012 #define TELEPORT_RED_IDLEFRAME_EP1   325
00013 
00014 #define TELEPORT_BASEFRAME_EP3  130
00015 #define TELEPORT_IDLEFRAME_EP3  134
00016 
00017 // rate at which the frame will change
00018 const int TELEPORTER_ANIM_RATE_EP1 = 1;
00019 const int TELEPORTER_ANIM_RATE_EP3 = 1;
00020 
00021 const int TELEPORTATION_SPEED = 128;
00022 
00023 // number of times to change the frame before stopping
00024 const int TELEPORTER_NUMFRAMES_EP3 = 16;
00025 const int TELEPORTER_NUMFRAMES_EP1 = 20;
00026 
00027 CTeleporter::CTeleporter(CMap *p_map, std::vector<CPlayer> &mp_vec_Player,
00028   Uint32 x, Uint32 y ) :
00029 CObject(p_map, x, y, OBJ_TELEPORTER),
00030 m_Player(mp_vec_Player)
00031 {
00032  int mx, my;
00033  mx = x >> CSF;
00034  my = y >> CSF;
00035 
00036  // first time initialization
00037  inhibitfall = true;
00038 
00039  //sprite = BlankSprite;
00040  //sprite = 0;
00041  animtimer = (g_pBehaviorEngine->getEpisode()!=3) ? TELEPORTER_ANIM_RATE_EP1 : TELEPORTER_ANIM_RATE_EP3;
00042  animframe = 0;
00043  numframechanges = 0;
00044 
00045  idleframe = mp_Map->at(mx,my);
00046  if(idleframe == TELEPORT_GRAY_IDLEFRAME_EP1)
00047   baseframe = TELEPORT_GRAY_BASEFRAME_EP1;
00048  else if(idleframe == TELEPORT_RED_IDLEFRAME_EP1)
00049   baseframe = TELEPORT_RED_BASEFRAME_EP1;
00050  else if(idleframe == TELEPORT_IDLEFRAME_EP3)
00051   baseframe = TELEPORT_BASEFRAME_EP3;
00052 
00053  g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_TELEPORT, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00054 }
00055 
00056 void CTeleporter::process()
00057 {
00058  int mx, my;
00059  unsigned int x = getXPosition();
00060  unsigned int y = getYPosition();
00061  int animrate, numframes;
00062  int player = whichplayer;
00063 
00064  mx = x >> CSF;
00065  my = y >> CSF;
00066 
00067  animrate = (g_pBehaviorEngine->getEpisode()!=3) ?
00068      TELEPORTER_ANIM_RATE_EP1 : TELEPORTER_ANIM_RATE_EP3;
00069  numframes = (g_pBehaviorEngine->getEpisode()!=3) ?
00070      TELEPORTER_NUMFRAMES_EP1 : TELEPORTER_NUMFRAMES_EP3;
00071 
00072 
00073  switch(direction)
00074  {
00075  case TELEPORTING_IN:
00076   {
00077    m_Player[player].beingteleported = true;
00078    m_Player[player].solid = false;
00079    if (animtimer >= animrate)
00080    {
00081     animframe++;
00082     animframe &= 3;
00083     numframechanges++;
00084     animtimer = 0;
00085 
00086     if (numframechanges > numframes)
00087     { // animation is done
00088      mp_Map->setTile(mx, my, idleframe);
00089      mp_Map->redrawAt(mx, my);
00090      numframechanges = 0;
00091      direction = TELEPORTING_SCROLL;
00092     }
00093     else
00094     { // teleport animation is not done. show the next frame
00095      mp_Map->setTile(mx, my, baseframe + animframe);
00096      mp_Map->redrawAt(mx, my);
00097     }
00098    }
00099    else
00100     animtimer++;
00101   } break;
00102 
00103  case TELEPORTING_SCROLL:
00104   {
00105    // In this part the player must be invisible and go to the new position, then get teleported out.
00106    x = destx<<CSF;
00107    y = desty<<CSF;
00108    moveTo(x, y);
00109    m_Player[player].pdir = DOWN;
00110    m_Player[player].beingteleported = true;
00111    m_Player[player].solid = false;
00112 
00113    if(x < m_Player[player].getXPosition())
00114     m_Player[player].moveLeft(TELEPORTATION_SPEED);
00115    else if(x > m_Player[player].getXPosition())
00116     m_Player[player].moveRight(TELEPORTATION_SPEED);
00117 
00118    int diff_x = x - m_Player[player].getXPosition();
00119    if(abs(diff_x) < TELEPORTATION_SPEED)
00120     m_Player[player].moveXDir(diff_x);
00121 
00122    if(y < m_Player[player].getYPosition())
00123     m_Player[player].moveUp(TELEPORTATION_SPEED);
00124    else if(y > m_Player[player].getYPosition())
00125     m_Player[player].moveDown(TELEPORTATION_SPEED);
00126 
00127    int diff_y = y - m_Player[player].getYPosition();
00128    if(abs(diff_y) < TELEPORTATION_SPEED)
00129     m_Player[player].moveYDir(diff_y);
00130 
00131    diff_x = (diff_x<0) ? -diff_x : diff_x;
00132    diff_y = (diff_y<0) ? -diff_y : diff_y;
00133 
00134    if(!m_Player[player].scrollTriggers() && diff_x<=TELEPORTATION_SPEED && diff_y<=TELEPORTATION_SPEED)
00135    {
00136     m_Player[player].moveTo(x, y);
00137     direction = TELEPORTING_OUT;
00138 
00139     idleframe = mp_Map->at(x>>CSF, y>>CSF);
00140     if(idleframe == TELEPORT_GRAY_IDLEFRAME_EP1)
00141      baseframe = TELEPORT_GRAY_BASEFRAME_EP1;
00142     else if(idleframe == TELEPORT_RED_IDLEFRAME_EP1)
00143      baseframe = TELEPORT_RED_BASEFRAME_EP1;
00144     else if(idleframe == TELEPORT_IDLEFRAME_EP3)
00145      baseframe = TELEPORT_BASEFRAME_EP3;
00146     g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_TELEPORT, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00147    }
00148   } break;
00149 
00150  case TELEPORTING_OUT:
00151   {
00152    if (animtimer >= animrate)
00153    {
00154     animframe++;
00155     animframe &= 3;
00156     numframechanges++;
00157     animtimer = 0;
00158 
00159     if (numframechanges > numframes)
00160     { // animation is done
00161      int player = whichplayer;
00162      mp_Map->setTile(mx, my, idleframe);
00163      mp_Map->redrawAt(mx, my);
00164 
00165      exists=false;
00166      m_Player[player].beingteleported = false;
00167      m_Player[player].solid = !m_Player[player].godmode;
00168     }
00169     else
00170     { // teleport animation is not done. show the next frame
00171      mp_Map->setTile(mx, my, baseframe + animframe);
00172      mp_Map->redrawAt(mx, my);
00173     }
00174    }
00175    else
00176     animtimer++;
00177   } break;
00178  }
00179 }
